metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47629 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Libksba before 1.6.3 is prone to an integer overflow vulnerability in the CRL signature parser.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47629` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libksba8 - 1.6.0-3ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libksba package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.0-3ubuntu1.1').
